channel.title: Problem 525 animations. [PI]
channel.description:
Hello, Im trying to add new graphics and animation to my PI base and im running into problems. After i finished everything and I compile I get no errors. However, when the client is loading the configs (right before the login screen) it crashes and the error is: [code]Error: loaderror Unpacking config 143 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 345391 at Stream.readDWord(Stream.java:144) at Animation.readValues(Animation.java:54) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:18) at client.startUp(client.java:7583) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4748) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Can anyone help me fix this? I've looked in stream.java and my readdword is [code] public int readDWord() { currentOffset += 4; return ((buffer[currentOffset - 4] & 0xff) << 24) + ((buffer[currentOffset - 3] & 0xff) << 16)
+ ((buffer[currentOffset - 2] & 0xff) << 8) + (buffer[currentOffset - 1] & 0xff); }[/code] So i dont know how to fix that. And I do have the 143.dat file in the right folder.
Please help me, I will kiss you if you do :)

item.title: Problem 525 animations. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

Hello, Im trying to add new graphics and animation to my PI base and im running into problems.
After i finished everything and I compile I get no errors.
However, when the client is loading the configs (right before the login screen) it crashes and the error is:

Error: loaderror Unpacking config 143 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 345391 at Stream.readDWord(Stream.java:144) at Animation.readValues(Animation.java:54) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:18) at client.startUp(client.java:7583) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4748) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Can anyone help me fix this? Iâ€™ve looked in stream.java and my readdword is

[code] public int readDWord() {
currentOffset += 4;
return ((buffer[currentOffset - 4] & 0xff) << 24) + ((buffer[currentOffset - 3] & 0xff) << 16)

  • ((buffer[currentOffset - 2] & 0xff) << 8) + (buffer[currentOffset - 1] & 0xff);
    }[/code]
    So i dont know how to fix that. And I do have the 143.dat file in the right folder.

Please help me, I will kiss you if you do
